name: Mohamed Razan
title: Senior Full Stack Developer | Flutter Specialist | CTO
summary: Self-driven software engineer with 5+ years of professional experience. Expert in Flutter and cross-platform mobile development. Skilled in building fintech, e-commerce, POS, SaaS platforms, domain reseller systems, and AI-powered apps. Strong leadership as CTO at Macvision IT Solutions, overseeing scalable architecture, cloud deployments, and team mentorship.

details: Leading product strategy and technical execution for domain reseller platforms, SaaS products, and custom mobile apps.
Managing cross-functional development teams and ensuring on-time delivery of projects.
Designed and deployed scalable cloud solutions on Firebase, AWS, and GCP.
Expanded company services to hosting, custom email solutions, and multiplayer game development.
Built and maintained multiple production apps in Flutter, integrating real-time Firebase databases and payment gateways.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment.
Enhanced customer platforms with hosting, custom email, and DNS management features.
Mentored junior developers, conducted code reviews, and streamlined team workflows.
Developed a finance-focused mobile app with multi-language support and real-time data visualization.
Integrated third-party APIs for payments, authentication, and transaction processing.
Collaborated with international teams to align app functionality with business goals.
Delivered custom Flutter apps for clients in e-commerce, logistics, and education.
Created POS systems with inventory management and offline sync.
Built small-scale AI chatbots using Python and TensorFlow for customer engagement.
